languages.text: Романтическая связь между Соломоном Антаром и влады{mf|кой|чицей} фон Валанциус преодолела все испытания, но ей не суждено было длиться долго. Хоть смерть и забрала арбитра, любовь к Вольному Торговцу обессмертила его: многие дворяне Простора следовали примеру проктора Антара, избирая объектом обожания влиятельную персону и принося ей наряду с клятвой служения еще и клятву романтической верности. Формулировкой "любить друг друга как {name} и Соломон" описывали отношения, в которых любовь стоит выше обязательств долга и не может быть разрушена даже кознями могущественных сюзеренов и командиров.

The romantic bond between Solomorne Anthar and {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius withstood every test, but it was not to last. Though death had claimed the Arbitrator, his love for the Rogue Trader immortalised him, as many among the Expanse's nobility followed Proctor Anthar's example in choosing an influential person as the object of their adoration and swearing romantic fidelity to them alongside their vows of service. The expression "to love each other like {name} and Solomorne" was soon taken up to describe any relationship where love surpassed duty and could not be broken even by the scheming of powerful suzerains and commanders.
languages.original_text: Романтическая связь между Соломоном Антаром и влады{mf|кой|чицей} фон Валанциус преодолела все испытания, но ей не суждено было длиться долго. Формулировкой "любить друг друга как {name} и Соломон" описывали отношения, в которых любовь стоит выше обязательств долга и не может быть разрушена даже кознями могущественных сюзеренов и командиров.

traits.locale_text: The romantic bond between Solomorne Anthar and the {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius stood every test, but it was not to last. Though death had claimed the Arbitrator, his love for the Rogue Trader immortalised him, as many among the Expanse's nobility followed Proctor Anthar's example in choosing an influential person as the object of their adoration, and vowing romantic fidelity to them alongside their vows of service. The expression "to love each other like {name} and Solomorne" described a relationship where love trumped duty and could not be broken even by the scheming of powerful suzerains and commanders.

The expression "to love each other like {name} and Solomorne" was soon taken up to describe any relationship where love surpassed duty and could not be broken even by the scheming of powerful suzerains and commanders.

languages.text: Die Romanze von Solomorne Anthar und {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius überstand jede Prüfung, hielt aber nicht ewig. Der Tod rief den Arbitrator zu sich, aber seine Liebe {mf|zum Freihändler|zur Freihändlerin} machte ihn unsterblich, und viele Adlige aus der Ausdehnung folgten Proktor Anthars Beispiel – sie wählten eine einflussreiche Person als Objekt ihrer Zuneigung und schworen dieser romantische Treue und Dienstgelübde gleichzeitig. Der Ausdruck "Liebe wie zwischen {name} und Solomorne" beschrieb schon bald jede Beziehung, in der die Liebe die Pflicht überstieg, sodass die nicht einmal durch Intrigen mächtiger Lehnsherren und Commander gebrochen werden konnte.
languages.original_text: The romantic bond between Solomorne Anthar and {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius withstood every test, but it was not to last. Though death had claimed the Arbitrator, his love for the Rogue Trader immortalised him, as many among the Expanse's nobility followed Proctor Anthar's example in choosing an influential person as the object of their adoration and swearing romantic fidelity to them alongside their vows of service. languages.text: La romance entre Solomorne Anthar et {mf|le seigneur|la dame} von Valancius résista à toutes les épreuves, mais ne dura pas. Même après la mort de l'arbitrator, l'amour indéfectible qu'il portait {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} inspira de nombreux nobles des Étendues à trouver une personne influente comme objet de leur adoration et à lui jurer une fidélité romantique en plus de leurs vœux de service. « S'aimer comme {name} et Solomorne » devint une expression commune pour décrire toute relation où le sens du devoir est surpassé par un amour que même les pires manigances des puissants ne peuvent briser.
languages.original_text: The romantic bond between Solomorne Anthar and {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius withstood every test, but it was not to last. Though death had claimed the Arbitrator, his love for the Rogue Trader immortalised him, as many among the Expanse's nobility followed Proctor Anthar's example in choosing an influential person as the object of their adoration and swearing romantic fidelity to them alongside their vows of service. The expression "to love each other like {name} and Solomorne" was soon taken up to describe any relationship where love surpassed duty and could not be broken even by the scheming of powerful suzerains and commanders.

traits.locale_text: La romance entre Solomorne Anthar et {mf|le seigneur|la dame} von Valancius résista à toutes les épreuves, mais ne dura pas. Même après la mort de l'arbitrator, l'amour indéfectible qu'il portait {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} inspira de nombreux nobles des Étendues à trouver une personne influente comme objet de leur adoration et à lui jurer une fidélité romantique en plus de leurs vœux de service. « S'aimer comme {name} et Solomorne » devint une expression commune pour décrire toute relation où le sens du devoir est surpassé par un amour que même les pires manigances des puissants ne peuvent briser.

languages.text: 索罗蒙·安萨与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝行商浪人之间的感情经受住了各种各样的考验，直到死亡将两人分开。尽管索罗蒙离开了人世，但他对行商浪人的爱，让他成为了科罗努斯扩区的不朽化身。许多贵族都愿意以索罗蒙·安萨监察官为榜样，选择有影响力的人作为表达爱意的对象，不仅承诺永远恪守职责，还许下永恒不变的爱情誓言。“像{name}与索罗蒙那样彼此相爱”，这句新的俗语用来描述爱意甚于责任的关系。无论是权谋、利益，还是诡计，都无法动摇这样的感情。
languages.original_text: The romantic bond between Solomorne Anthar and {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius withstood every test, but it was not to last. Though death had claimed the Arbitrator, his love for the Rogue Trader immortalised him, as many among the Expanse's nobility followed Proctor Anthar's example in choosing an influential person as the object of their adoration and swearing romantic fidelity to them alongside their vows of service. The expression "to love each other like {name} and Solomorne" was soon taken up to describe any relationship where love surpassed duty and could not be broken even by the scheming of powerful suzerains and commanders.

索罗蒙·安萨与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝行商浪人之间的感情经受住了各种各样的考验，直到死亡将两人分开。尽管索罗蒙离开了人世，但他对行商浪人的爱，让他成为了科罗努斯扩区的不朽化身。许多贵族都愿意以索罗蒙·安萨监察官为榜样，选择有影响力的人作为表达爱意的对象，不仅承诺永远恪守职责，还许下永恒不变的爱情誓言。“像{name}与索罗蒙那样彼此相爱”，这句新的俗语用来描述爱意甚于责任的关系。无论是权谋、利益，还是诡计，都无法动摇这样的感情。

languages.text: El vínculo romántico entre Solomorne Anthar y {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius superó todas las pruebas, pero no estaba destinado a durar. Aunque la muerte se llevó al Arbitrator, su amor por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente lo inmortalizó, ya que muchos de los nobles de la Extensión siguieron el ejemplo del Procurador Anthar: eligieron a una persona influyente como ideal romántico y juraron fidelidad amorosa junto con sus votos de servicio. Pronto, la expresión «amarse como {name} y Solomorne» se hizo popular para describir relaciones en las que el amor inquebrantable superaba al deber y se anteponía incluso a la oposición de soberanos y comandantes poderosos.
languages.original_text: The romantic bond between Solomorne Anthar and {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius withstood every test, but it was not to last. Though death had claimed the Arbitrator, his love for the Rogue Trader immortalised him, as many among the Expanse's nobility followed Proctor Anthar's example in choosing an influential person as the object of their adoration and swearing romantic fidelity to them alongside their vows of service. The expression "to love each other like {name} and Solomorne" was soon taken up to describe any relationship where love surpassed duty and could not be broken even by the scheming of powerful suzerains and commanders.

traits.locale_text: El vínculo romántico entre Solomorne Anthar y {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius superó todas las pruebas, pero no estaba destinado a durar. Aunque la muerte se llevó al Arbitrator, su amor por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente lo inmortalizó, ya que muchos de los nobles de la Extensión siguieron el ejemplo del Procurador Anthar: eligieron a una persona influyente como ideal romántico y juraron fidelidad amorosa junto con sus votos de servicio. Pronto, la expresión «amarse como {name} y Solomorne» se hizo popular para describir relaciones en las que el amor inquebrantable superaba al deber y se anteponía incluso a la oposición de soberanos y comandantes poderosos.

languages.text: ソロモーン・アンサールと{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスとのロマンチックな絆は数々の試練を乗り越えたが、永遠には続かなかった。たとえアービトレイターが死を迎えたとしても、ローグトレーダーへの彼の愛は不滅であった。エクスパンスの貴族たちの多くが、アンサール代理人の例に倣い、影響力のある人物を崇拝の対象として選び、奉仕の誓いと共に恋愛の忠誠も誓うようになったのだ。「{name}とソロモーンのように愛し合う」という表現は、やがて、愛が義務を超え、強力な宗主や司令官の策略によっても壊せない関係を指す言葉として定着した。
languages.original_text: The romantic bond between Solomorne Anthar and {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius withstood every test, but it was not to last. Though death had claimed the Arbitrator, his love for the Rogue Trader immortalised him, as many among the Expanse's nobility followed Proctor Anthar's example in choosing an influential person as the object of their adoration and swearing romantic fidelity to them alongside their vows of service. The expression "to love each other like {name} and Solomorne" was soon taken up to describe any relationship where love surpassed duty and could not be broken even by the scheming of powerful suzerains and commanders.

languages.text: Solomorne Anthar ile {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius arasındaki romantik bağ, her türlü badireyi atlattı ancak bu ilişkinin ömrü uzun olmadı. Ecel, Yargıcı'yı almış olsa da Hür Tacir'e duyduğu aşk onu ölümsüzleştirdi. Zira Enginlik soyluları arasından pek çok kişi, hayranlıklarının nesnesi olacak nüfuzlu birini seçip onlara hizmet yeminlerinin yanı sıra romantik bir sadakat yemini etme konusunda Üsteğmen Anthar'ı timsal bildi. "{name} ile Solomorne gibi sevmek" ifadesi, kısa sürede aşkın görevin önüne geçtiği ve güçlü hükümdarlar ile komutanların entrikalarıyla bile kırılamadığı her türlü ilişkiyi tanımlamak için kullanılmaya başlandı.
languages.original_text: The romantic bond between Solomorne Anthar and {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius withstood every test, but it was not to last. Though death had claimed the Arbitrator, his love for the Rogue Trader immortalised him, as many among the Expanse's nobility followed Proctor Anthar's example in choosing an influential person as the object of their adoration and swearing romantic fidelity to them alongside their vows of service. The expression "to love each other like {name} and Solomorne" was soon taken up to describe any relationship where love surpassed duty and could not be broken even by the scheming of powerful suzerains and commanders.
